Title: Login - Username - input - empty - invalid
Steps (When): Input only password (vaild) and click login button

Steps (When): Input only password (vaild) and click login button

Title: Login - Username - input - cleared - invalid
Steps (When): Input password (vaild), input username (valid), clear username field and click login

Title: Login - Password - input - cleared - invalid
Steps (When): Input username (vaild), input password (valid), clear password field and click login

Title: Login - Button - inputs are empty
Steps (When): Click login button

Title: Login - Forgot Password

Title: Create Account - Username - input - is only input - invalid
Steps (When): Input only username (vaild) and click login button
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "Passwords should be between 8 and 72 characters long. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Username - input - empty - invalid
Steps (When): Input only password (vaild) and click login button
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "Usernames can only contain letters, digits, dashes and underscores, and should be between 2 and 15 characters long. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Username - input - cleared - invalid
Steps (When): Input password (vaild), input username (valid), clear username field and click login
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "Usernames can only contain letters, digits, dashes and underscores, and should be between 2 and 15 characters long. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Username - input - min length - invalid
Steps (When): Input password (vaild), input username min length (invalid), and click login
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "Usernames can only contain letters, digits, dashes and underscores, and should be between 2 and 15 characters long. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Username - input - max length - invalid
Steps (When): Input password (vaild), input username max length (invalid), and click login
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "Usernames can only contain letters, digits, dashes and underscores, and should be between 2 and 15 characters long. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Username - input - already exists - invalid
Steps (When): Input password (vaild), input username exists (invalid), and click login
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "That username is taken. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Password - input - cleared - invalid
Steps (When): Input username (vaild), input password (valid), clear password field and click login

Title: Create Account - Password - input - min length - invalid
Steps (When): Input username(vaild), input password min length (invalid), and click login
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "Passwords should be between 8 and 72 characters long. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Password - input - max length - invalid
Steps (When): Input username(vaild), input password max length (invalid), and click login
Expected Result (Then): Display error: "Passwords should be between 8 and 72 characters long. Please choose another."

Title: Create Account - Password - input - char validation - invalid
Steps (When): Input username(vaild), input password without special char (invalid), and click login

Title: Create Account - Button - valid
Steps (When): Input username (vaild), input password (valid), and click login button
